text:
I think what lead me to this choice of career is not a passion for it. In fact, even if I love computer science, this is not what I prefer in life, but it is
something I can use to make money and have fun to be able to pratice my favorite hobbies. Some elements can still explain my choice, let me tell
you my origin story.
When I was very young, I saw my sister playing videogames and I instantly became a huge lover of these. They can explain why I became familiarwith computers and internet pretty fast. I was also a huge fan of creativity and liberty, to invent stories, that is something that I can find in
videogames and in informatic in general.I also love to discover things, and the fact is that I almost didn't know anything about computer science before entering my school. That is why I am
very interested in what I learn, even if I would love to learn a bit more about other domains like history for example.Informatic is also a domain where I think I have the same spirit as a lot of people, so I feel good studying and working in this area in the future.
I think working all the day long with commercials for example would be very annoying to me because I feel really different from them and I am not a
huge fan of the global mentality of this work environnement.Entering in an informatic school is also a good way to discover people who have more chances to share my favorite hobbies. It is a wonderfulfeeling to be able to speak with someone about something that you love.This working area is also an opportunity to travel around the world and meet different people with different cultures, learn new languages, take
a step from what I can live in Paris.
